pages.text: The Voodoo Poppet is a classic.$(br2)It can be used to throw whoever is bound to it, drown them, set them on fire, and even apply potion effects to them from anywhere!$(br2)Of course, to do the latter ones you will have to suffer the effects yourself.
Voodoo Poppets do not work in $(l:bewitchment:tools/poppet_shelves)Poppet Shelves$().
